conv_purpose: User seeks advice from a nutritionist on developing a personalized diet plan to manage a health condition.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user asks the nutritionist for guidance on creating a diet plan to manage a specific health condition.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user initiates the conversation with a clear task-oriented request related to health, setting the stage for a structured dialogue.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user follows up by asking for specific food recommendations or dietary restrictions based on the health condition discussed in the previous round.
summarized prompts.explanation: This provides a follow-up structure since the user's prompt builds directly on the information provided in the initial request, narrowing down to more detailed suggestions.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user follows the last round dialogue by requesting a sample weekly meal plan incorporating the recommended foods and restrictions.
summarized prompts.explanation: This continues the follow-up structure, as the user further refines the inquiry, asking for a practical application of the advice received in previous turns.

conv_task: Task-oriented Role-playing: The LLM assistant is assigned to role-paly as a specific role by user (e.g., doctor, customer service, teacher) to complete associated tasks or simulate scenarios.

conv_purpose: The user wants to draft a legal document related to a business contract, ensuring clarity and completeness by refining each aspect through role-playing with a legal expert.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: User requests a basic outline for a business contract related to a partnership agreement.
summarized prompts.explanation: This initial request sets the stage for a task-oriented role-playing conversation, where the LLM assistant acts as a legal expert to provide a foundational contract structure.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the format of the contract outline to include bullet points for clarity.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user modifies the presentation style of the information provided in the previous round to enhance clarity, thus aligning with the 'refinement' structure by changing the format without altering the topic.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user seeks a summary of the content discussed in the outline and the revised format.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user requests a consolidation of the contract details into a cohesive overview, adhering to the 'summary' structure as defined by the dialogue structure template.

conv_task: Task-oriented Role-playing: The LLM assistant is assigned to role-paly as a specific role by user (e.g., doctor, customer service, teacher) to complete associated tasks or simulate scenarios.

conv_purpose: The user seeks to learn about cellular biology by requesting information about cell structure from a biology teacher and revising their request for more precise or varied answers.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user asks the biology teacher for a detailed explanation of the components and functions of an animal cell, seeking to enhance their understanding of cellular biology.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt sets the foundation for the dialogue by establishing a clear and focused task-oriented request, in alignment with the scenario 'Clear Purpose Dialogue.'

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the request to focus on the details of the cell membrane, asking for a simplified explanation to better grasp its composition and role in the cell.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user revises the previous prompt by narrowing down the focus to the cell membrane and requesting a simplified explanation. This change aligns with the definition of 'Refinement' because it adjusts the complexity of the response requested without changing the overarching topic.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the request further by asking for examples of how the cell membrane interacts with its environment, aiming to understand real-world applications or phenomena.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user revises the prompt again, this time requesting practical examples of cell membrane interactions to facilitate a deeper and applied understanding, thereby following the 'Refinement' structure by altering the conceptual approach while keeping the same topic.

conv_task: Task-oriented Role-playing: The LLM assistant is assigned to role-paly as a specific role by user (e.g., doctor, customer service, teacher) to complete associated tasks or simulate scenarios.

conv_purpose: The user seeks guidance on improving their sleep quality by consulting a virtual health expert.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user asks the virtual health expert to provide general tips for improving sleep quality.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt initiates the dialogue with a clear request for guidance on a specific health-related topic, aligning with the purpose of seeking advice from a role-playing scenario.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user follows up on the tips provided by inquiring about specific lifestyle adjustments that could enhance sleep hygiene.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user's prompt follows the expert's initial advice by requesting more detailed guidance, thereby introducing additional constraints to refine the focus of the conversation.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the specificity in last round's prompt to focus on dietary changes that could improve sleep quality for more targeted advice.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user revises their inquiry to concentrate on a particular aspect of lifestyle changes, emphasizing dietary adjustments, to obtain precise recommendations related to sleep enhancement.

conv_task: Task-oriented Role-playing: The LLM assistant is assigned to role-paly as a specific role by user (e.g., doctor, customer service, teacher) to complete associated tasks or simulate scenarios.

conv_purpose: User seeks financial advice in a task-oriented role-playing dialogue, where the assistant acts as a financial advisor to help plan a diversified investment portfolio.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: User requests initial advice on creating a diversified investment portfolio, focusing on the allocation of assets across different categories like stocks, bonds, and real estate.
summarized prompts.explanation: This is the starting point of the conversation where the user sets up the task for the assistant by asking for general advice on investment portfolio creation.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the allocation focus in the last round's prompt to emphasize a more conservative approach, ensuring lower risk for long-term stability.
summarized prompts.explanation: The refinement structure is evident as the user modifies the constraint of asset allocation to reflect a more specific, conservative approach instead of seeking another asset category or changing the investment topic entirely.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user follows the last round dialogue by asking for specific suggestions on low-risk investment options that fit into the previously discussed conservative portfolio strategy.
summarized prompts.explanation: The follow-up structure is maintained as the user continues to develop the same conversation thread by asking for specific investment options that align with the revised conservative strategy.

conv_task: Task-oriented Role-playing: The LLM assistant is assigned to role-paly as a specific role by user (e.g., doctor, customer service, teacher) to complete associated tasks or simulate scenarios.

conv_purpose: The user is engaging in a dialogue to gain a comprehensive understanding of a scientific concept through a task-oriented role-playing scenario where the assistant acts as a science teacher.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user asks the assistant to explain the concept of photosynthesis in simple terms as if teaching a class.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt starts the conversation and sets the context for the assistant to role-play as a science teacher, introducing the fundamental topic of photosynthesis.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user follows the previous explanation by asking for more details on how different types of plants might perform photosynthesis in varying environments.
summarized prompts.explanation: The follow-up prompt builds on the initial explanation, as the user seeks additional details to deepen their understanding of the topic introduced in the first round.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user seeks a summary of the content discussed regarding photosynthesis and its variations across plant types in different environments.
summarized prompts.explanation: This summary request asks the assistant to consolidate the information provided in the previous rounds into a cohesive overview, reflecting the user's desire to piece together the acquired knowledge.

conv_task: Task-oriented Role-playing: The LLM assistant is assigned to role-paly as a specific role by user (e.g., doctor, customer service, teacher) to complete associated tasks or simulate scenarios.

conv_purpose: The user wants to learn about building a custom desktop computer by consulting an expert on the necessary components and their specifications, aiming to understand how to optimize for performance and budget.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user inquires about the essential components needed to build a custom desktop computer, seeking detailed information on each component's role and compatibility with others.
summarized prompts.explanation: The initial conversation sets the stage for acquiring basic knowledge about computer components, aligning with the task-oriented role-playing scenario where the assistant acts as a computer expert.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the requirement of receiving a comprehensive list to instead request advice focusing on components that offer the best performance for a mid-range budget.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user changes their focus from general information to more specific guidance, seeking to optimize their computer build based on the budget, which corresponds to revising the constraints while maintaining the same topic.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user further revises the request, asking for the same performance-oriented advice but now with an emphasis on ensuring the components are energy efficient as well.
summarized prompts.explanation: In this step, the user modifies the requirements to include energy efficiency as an additional factor while retaining the focus on performance, reflecting a further refinement of the same inquiry.

conv_task: Task-oriented Role-playing: The LLM assistant is assigned to role-paly as a specific role by user (e.g., doctor, customer service, teacher) to complete associated tasks or simulate scenarios.

conv_purpose: The user engages in a dialogue where the assistant role-plays as a financial advisor to gain insights on stock investment strategies and a summary of optimal practices.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user asks the assistant, acting as a financial advisor, to provide some basic investment strategies in the stock market.
summarized prompts.explanation: This initial prompt sets the stage for the dialogue by requesting specific information relevant to stock investments, aligning with the task-oriented role-playing scenario.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user follows up by asking for examples of stocks that align with the investment strategies discussed in the previous round.
summarized prompts.explanation: The 'follow-up' structure is reflected here as the user builds on the initial investment strategy discussion by seeking more detailed and practical examples.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user seeks a summary of the best practices for investing in stocks based on the strategies and examples provided in previous rounds.
summarized prompts.explanation: The 'summary' structure is evident as the user requests a cohesive overview combining the strategies and stock examples discussed earlier, providing clarity and concluding the dialogue purposefully.

conv_purpose: The user seeks advice on adopting a healthier lifestyle with personalized tips from a fitness trainer.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user asks the fitness trainer for a general overview of a healthy lifestyle and the key elements involved in maintaining it.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt sets the stage for the conversation by introducing the topic of a healthy lifestyle and requesting a foundational overview from the fitness trainer.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the level of detail requested in the last round's prompt to focus specifically on dietary recommendations instead of broad lifestyle tips for getting more personalized nutrition guidance.
summarized prompts.explanation: In this round, the user revises the prompt by narrowing down the focus to dietary advice, changing the specific topic aspect without altering the overall theme of a healthy lifestyle.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user seeks a summary of the content discussed in the previous rounds to consolidate the general lifestyle overview and the specific dietary advice into a cohesive guide.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt requests a summary, aligning with the definition by asking to synthesize the general and specific advice given into a coherent overview.
